item.title: Pk points exchange
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

if (MyShopID == 47) { if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { pkPoints -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } return true; } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); return false; } } else { sM("Not enough points for this item."); return false; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Pk points exchange
item.dc:creator: @2killsami 2killsami
item.description:
@2killsami wrote:

hi, i’ve added pkpoints exchange shop but the problem is that you can still buy itesm with coins
heres my code

if (MyShopID == 47) { if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { pkPoints -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough points for this item."); } } }

Read full topic
